!Fisher Evert: When I was young, I also dreamed of traveling the world and seeking adventure. But eventually I fell in love with a woman and became a fisherman. Now I am retired, with no care but to cast my line on a peaceful afternoon... This is not a bad life at all, is it? Please remove that sword. The reflecting sunlight is scaring the fish... [Quest _229_TestOfWitchcraft 30633-02.htm|Pull out the Sword of Binding]
